title: Adventure in Venice
creator_credit: John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Presents aspects of day-to-day life in Venice. Tells a story about a boy who loses a prized model ship on the waterways of his city. Gives a comprehensive view of this water dependent city, noting the historic sites and large tourist trade.
